channel.title: Asset Browser on Taleworlds Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Asset Browser on Taleworlds Documentation

item.title: Filter Queries
item.description: You can use sql syntax to search for assets with specific properties like textures whose resolutions are greater than 1024. To do this you need to enable query mode from extras menu : From the Texture Inspector (Right Panel), you can enable/disable MipMap blending by toggling Use Mipmap Blendingcheckbox. When you enable MipMap Blending, you will see all mip levels of the selected texture next to each other in Preview Window.
